1333860.name: Wild West Survival
1333860.description:
Wild West Survival is an open world survival game with a huge world. Survive the wild west by crafting, building, hunting, farming, fishing, mining, and raiding. When survival is feasible, prosper the wild west by building towns throughout the land.

ENVIRONMENT

• Huge Open World • Multiple Biomes • Swimmable Areas • Full Day / Night Cycle

WILD LIFE

• Deer • Cougar • Moose • Elk • Bear • Rabbit • Raccoon • Horse • Fox • Wolf • Boar

BASE BUILDING

• Modular Build Parts • Furniture • Non-modular Building Units

FARMING

• Crops • Livestock

CHARACTER SELECTION

• Cowboy • Cowgirl

NPC

• Civilians • Sheriffs • Bandits • Hired Guns • Wildlife

SURVIVAL

• Hunger and Thirst System • Harvestable Items • Hunting • Farming • Loots

COMBAT

• Archery • Melee • Range

HIRED GUNS

• Sadie • Javier

CRAFTABLES

• Tools • Weapons • Workbences

TRANSPORTATION

• Horse Riding System • Train

MARKET

• Buy from Vendors • Sell to Vendors • Hired Guns

WEARABLES

• Shirts • Pants • Shoes • Hats • Wigs
1333860.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
